results.content:
The course content is good, but what annoys me is that Awais does not respond to student Q&As and he sometimes copies generic code from other sources without explaining to us which source he used, IE the Angular Material Module imports code. We have to search for that code ourselves or manually type it out line by line, which is annoying.
Another issue I have is that this course does not have source code which we can reference when running into errors.
results.content_html:

We have to search for that code ourselves or manually type it out line by line, which is annoying.
Another issue I have is that this course does not have source code which we can reference when running into errors.

results.content: The course material and pace is okay but there are better courses. The instructor does cover some things other courses don't so if you are looking to be immersed in Angular this course is worth including in a series of courses.
results.content_html: The course material and pace is okay but there are better courses. The instructor does cover some things other courses don't so if you are looking to be immersed in Angular this course is worth including in a series of courses.

results.content: Angular concepts concisely explained, great content !
Overall the course content is good for beginners , The final project was informative and helpful , i would recommend to explain more the async functions written in the expense logger project.
results.content_html: Overall the course content is good for beginners , The final project was informative and helpful , i would recommend to explain more the async functions written in the expense logger project.

results.content: The course content is ok and I have learnt a few new things but I feel the video are not properly edited as the sound and video quality is really bad and not consistent. In some videos the screen does not show all the code and I cannot see what is typed in the terminal. In other videos the text is really small but you can see the entire screen. The instructor explains everything step by step but its really frustrating if you cant see the code or view the source. I stopped watching in section 9 which is a pity as  I think the projects are well written.

response.content:
Hi Christopher, i am willing to update videos where you dont see the code. could you please point out the videos which you think code is not shown Also i have uploaded the Full HD quality of video. Please check with udemy regarding quality.

Will update videos within 24 hours and also if you have any other complaints or suggestions about the course you are more than welcome to share that with me.

Regards
AWAIS JAMIL
